long_description: Stocked with features to keep you dry and comfortable on the water, the Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is designed specifically to fit women. The women's Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is supple, quiet and very packable, and it maximizes freedom of movement thanks to an articulated design. It'll be dry on the inside thanks to Gore-tex(R) Paclite(R) fabric, an especially light, packable and breathable version of Gore-tex fabric. Adjustable spandex collar and cuffs smoothly seal out splashes, and adjustable drawcord waist prevents jacket from riding up in the cockpit. You can access the zippered left-sleeve pocket and store a key on the internal lanyard even if you're wearing a PFD. Factory sealed seams enhance dryness. The Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket enhances visibility via reflective piping.
short_description: Stocked with features to keep you dry and comfortable on the water, the Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is designed specifically to fit women.
